channel.title: I have dc probs and a coding question
channel.description: I have problems where people will disconnect repeatedly at random. Sometimes it even happens to me and i endup re-booting the server. Is there any way i can fix it. I am also wondering, How to i make a code to jail people so they cant teleport out and so they get teleported to the jail?

item.title: I have dc probs and a coding question
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

im not asking for a spoonfeed… i looked all over for a tut… and yet nobody has one for ::jail and ::unjail[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 05:43:33 pm[/size][hr]plus i love how everybody here like to rag on people… without knowing them at all… its funny… i get a good laf outta it all… cause this is the 3rd time ive asked for help… yet… none of the other 2 times did the help acually not fuck up my server…

Read full topic
item.source: I have dc probs and a coding question

item.title: I have dc probs and a coding question
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:265656”][quote author=Client377 link=topic=350691.msg2693751#msg2693751 date=1236121897]
before teleport void

if(canteleport == true) {

then put canteleport = true; at top turn off when jail
[/quote]
to be honest im not sure how to make it teleport someone besides to you… any way you could give me an example with like… ::jail and ::unjail…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 05:24:12 pm[/size][hr]and yet… nobody cares enuf to help me… wow what a suprise[/quote]

no, no one cares to spoonfeed

Read full topic
